betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Now we need to make the acid we need to process tungsten.  That would be Hydrochloric Acid.  You combine your sulfuric acid from the previous mixer and add some salt.  You will get Hydrochloric acid and sodium

Make sure you use the stainless steel pipes to connect the output of the Sulfuric acid mixer to the hydrochloric acid mixer you are setting up.  Put some salt in the input of the mixer and you should be set.

Just like the previous mixers, you only need a single bronze burning box, boiler, and turbine.

You will need the following machines:
1 Bronze Burning box [any type]
1 Bronze Boiler
1 Bronze Turbine
1 Bronze Mixer

-OR-
1 Bronze Diesel Generator
1 Bronze Mixer
§b
You will also need:
some Small Stainless Steel Fluid Pipes
§e
Warning:  Just like with Sulfuric Acid you need to use stainless steel drums and pipes.

§a§6
Mixer Recipe:
2 salt or rock salt dust + 7000L Sulfuric Acid => [Mixer 16 RU/t] => 7 Sodium Bisulfate Dust + 2000L Hydrochloric Acid

§6§a
To complete the quest collect:
1000L of Hydrochloric Acid in a drum
